p: Cells were seeded 1 day before infection at 80% confluence and infected with virus (MOI = 1). The cells were then harvested and lysed at the indicated times. The cell lysates were centrifuged and quantified, then denatured by boiling in a loading buffer for 10 min, and were subjected to SDS polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis (SDS-PAGE). Western blot analysis was performed using a standard protocol ( 49).
